name: Houlihan Lokey
overview: Houlihan Lokey is an international investment bank with expertise in mergers and acquisitions, capital markets, financial restructuring, and valuation. The firm is ranked globally as the No. 1 restructuring advisor, the No. 1 M&A fairness opinion advisor over the past 10 years, and the No. 1 M&A advisor for U.S. transactions under $1 billion, according to Thomson Reuters. Houlihan Lokey has 14 offices and more than 800 employees in the United States, Europe and Asia. The firm serves more than 1,000 clients each year, ranging from closely held companies to Global 500 corporations. Houlihan Lokey was founded in 1972 and is based in Los Angeles, California with additional offices in New York, New York; Chicago, Illinois; San Francisco, California; Minneapolis, Minnesota; McLean, Virginia; Dallas, Texas; Atlanta, Georgia; Paris, France; Frankfurt am Main, Germany; Hong Kong, Hong Kong; Tokyo, Japan; and London, United Kingdom.
